data.title: HBCU-UP ACE Student Research Opps
meta_keywords: Historically Black Colleges and Universities Louisiana
data.meta_description: Southern University and A&M College,  the flagship of the Southern University System, is a historically Black, 1890 Land-Grant Institution. The University provides opportunities for a diverse student population to achieve a high-quality, global educational experience, to engage in scholarly research and creative activities, and to give meaningful public service to the community, state, nation and world.
data.text:
Research and Internship Opportunities for Undergraduate STEM Majors

Unless otherwise noted, Southern University does not administer or sponsor the opportunities listed on this website. The brief descriptions are merely a guide for current undergraduate students. Please refer to the external website that is linked to the short description for questions or additional information.

2014/15 Google SVA Scholarship in Computer Science (http://scholarship-positions.com/2014-google-sva-computer-science-scholarship-usa/2013/09/26/) - open to all full-time studen veterans pursuing computer science or similar degrees. Recipients receive $10,000 award and invitation to attend Google's 2014 Summer Annual Scholars' Retreat.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

2014 Summer Transportation Internship Program for Diverse Groups (http://www.fhwa.dot.gov/education/stipdg.cfm) - provide university students in all majors with experience working on current transportation-related topics and issues.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Department of Energy Science Undergraduate Laboratory Internships (http://science.energy.gov/wdts/suli/) - opportunities for undergraduate students to participate in ongoing research activities.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

DHS-STEM Summer Internship Program (http://www.orau.gov/dhseducation/internships/) - 10-week research experiences for undergraduate and graduate students at national laboratories and other research facilities.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

DHS Summer Research Team Program for MSIs (http://www.orau.gov/dhseducation/faculty/index.html) - provides opportunities for faculty and student teams to conduct research at the university-based DHS Centers of Excellence.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

FREEDM Systems Centers 2014 Undergraduate Research Scholars Program (http://www.freedm.ncsu.edu/index.php?s=5&p=139) - research opportunity for undergraduates majoring in electrical and computer engineering, civil engineering, mechanical engineering, materials science engineering, computer science and related fields.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Higher Education Research Experiences at Oak Ridge National Laboratory for Undergraduate Students (www.orau.org/ornl/hereatornl/default.htm) - opportunities to participate in research in a broad range of science and engineering activities related to basic sciences, energy, and the environment.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Los Alamos National Laboratory Undergraduate Student Program (http://www.lanl.gov/careers/career-options/student-internships/undergraduate/index.php) - year-round educational program opportunities that provide students with relevant research experiences while they are pursuing an undergraduate degree.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

National Energy Technology Laboratory (http://www.orau.gov/netl/) - opportunities for graduate and undergraduate students to participate in energy-related research.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Nuclear Engineering Science Laboratory Synthesis (http://www.ornl.gov/sci/nsed/outreach/internship_nesls.shtml) - opportunities to work in nuclear science.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Nuclear Regulatory Commission Historically Black Colleges and Universities Student Research Participation (http://see.orau.org/ProgramDescription.aspx?Program=10050) - opportunities to participate in on-going Nuclear Regulatory Commission research and development activities.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education and Oak Ridge Associated Universities (http://see.orau.org/ornl) - summer and academic year research experiences and internships for undergraduates, recent graduates, graduate students, and postdocs majoring in science, technology, engineering and mathematics. Faculty and K-12 student and teacher opportunities also available.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Pathways to Science (http://www.pathwaystoscience.org/) - a variety of undergraduate and graduate internships, fellowships, and scholarships nationwide in a wide range of STEM and related disciplines.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Rutgers Research Experiences for Undergraduates in Perceptual Science and Technology (http://ruccs.rutgers.edu/persci_reu/announcement.html) - summer research opportunity for undergaduates with a major in computer science, psychology, information science or a closely related field.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website

Summer 2014 Cultural and Academic Engagement Opportunity (http://www.subr.edu/index.cfm/page/1208) - sustainability-based cultural and academic learning opportunities provided by Southern University's HBCU-UP ACE Implementation Project at Guizhou University in Guiyang, China.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE FOR LETTER OF INTEREST: November 1, 2013

University of Minnesota Summer Research Experiences for Undergraduates in Electrical and Computer Engineering (http://www.ece.umn.edu/aboutECE/ECEREU.html) - 10-week summer research opportunities with Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: See agency website
